audioText: Les voisins crient toujours très fort le soir quand ils regardent le match de football à la télévision.
question: When do the neighbors shout loudly?
options: The neighbors shout loudly in the evening when watching football on TV
The neighbors shout loudly in the morning during breakfast
The neighbors shout loudly when they argue with each other
The neighbors shout loudly when they listen to music
explanation: The text states 'Les voisins crient toujours très fort le soir quand ils regardent le match de football à la télévision' - The neighbors always shout very loudly in the evening when they watch the football match on television. 'Crient' is the third person plural present tense of 'crier' (to shout/cry out), showing habitual action.
